title: There is something wrong with Joey un-cut
description: Back Cover BlurbThere is Something Wrong with JoeyChildren are missing in Union County, Illinois. Where are these missing boys? What dark force could be behind this?The unpopular and odd boy from the Midwest, Joey, finds himself the main target of the town bullies. In order to rise above them and dish out his payback, Joey confides in his deepest fears to mask his insecurities and take on a new persona. This leads Joey down a dark and murderous path. Joeyâ€™s revenge is not only gory it also hits on a stroke of evil brilliance. Is anyone in Union County safe?
author: S. Lee Glick
